metadata.title: Dog during quarantine.
metadata.description: Day45 - At least you’ve got a dog

title: Dog during quarantine.
description:
As [COVID-19](https://it.wikipedia.org/wiki/COVID-19) sweeps the globe, causing unprecedented effects, nonprofits, foundations, and governments are working to figure out the best course of action to serve their communities. \
The world population is forced to live indoors during the lockdown. 

My dog helped make this moment special.
